person:biography.personal-details:content: Biologist Geneticist Biotechnologist, Master in Sciences and Technology Major in Molecular and Cellular Biology Specialty Immunology, Training in Research in Innovative Immunotherapies and Vaccination. Professor at undergraduate and postgraduate level in different universities such as Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos, Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia, Universidad Nacional del Callao, Universidad Tecnológica del Perú, Universidad Privada Sergio Bernales and Universidad Científica del Sur.
